lyrics:
"Runnin Round The Lobby" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Runnin Round The Lobby" (with PeeWee Longway) [Hook:] Runnin round the lobby While we go on that molly Runnin round the lobby And the paper can't shit stop me Runnin round the lobby If a nigga pay I'm a rob 'em Runnin round the lobby And I keep talking to Scotty Runnin round the lobby If you want I make a profit Runnin round the lobby I'll be searchin finna watching Runnin round the lobby If I call my niggas coming Runnin round the lobby All on gunning [Verse 1:] We get in the kitchen like a chemist World champion, doing the row bit So much of this shit I'm getting claustrophobic I want the cheese and dough keep the anchovies Ye, cash out for man I'm loaded It's too much of this shit I need more baking soda Home boy kinda work, in the land rover I crack a smile when I move the coca cola This shit make me frown and got a bad odor I got a cap for them birds like they fallin on you Place your order, we got plenty more When we runnin out of that we got another load [Hook:] Runnin round the lobby While we go on that molly Runnin round the lobby And the paper can't shit stop me Runnin round the lobby If a nigga pay I'm a rob 'em Runnin round the lobby And I keep talking to Scotty Runnin round the lobby If you want I make a profit Runnin round the lobby I'll be searchin finna watching Runnin round the lobby If I call my niggas coming Runnin round the lobby All on gunning [Verse 2:] I scrool on in my dictionary Get up on that molly I don't talk scottish I gotta fuck somebody I'm runnin round the lobby In and after after hour Me and the count we steady mobbin' Keep up off them molly Nigga set tripping Must I now we double creepin Niggas gonna get their isha And we gon' think off for isser 24 hours you can get it We workin and we grinding Every time you ring my line It ain't never listed a dime Runnin through the lobby that's how I got mine Keep those on you know I gotta shine I'm in the lobby, with the count And they know how we rockin And when I get up on that molly Could you freeze some of that talking You runnin round that lobby [Hook:] Runnin round the lobby While we go on that molly Runnin round the lobby And the paper can't shit stop me Runnin round the lobby If a nigga pay I'm a rob 'em Runnin round the lobby And I keep talking to Scotty Runnin round the lobby If you want I make a profit Runnin round the lobby I'll be searchin finna watching Runnin round the lobby If I call my niggas coming Runnin round the lobby All on gunning [Verse 3:] I swear I be runnin round the lobby And I run into it if money is the topic Getting rich is the mission, going broke is not an option Real with the real then we stashing up the profit Now I'm iced up flying in a foreign object I stay down for it on my trapaholic I'm about to take this molly, take off just like a rocket Ram through her on the benz we showin off a puppet All that B shit you know that shit Elvis Made 20 yesterday I'm a selfish I need my gray all my realish I got a money fetish [Hook:] Runnin round the lobby While we go on that molly Runnin round the lobby And the paper can't shit stop me Runnin round the lobby If a nigga pay I'm a rob 'em Runnin round the lobby And I keep talking to Scotty Runnin round the lobby If you want I make a profit Runnin round the lobby I'll be searchin finna watching Runnin round the lobby If I call
